basic_information.scholarship_name: Carl Breazeale Endowed Scholarship in Industrial Safety

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies pursuing a degree in Industrial Safety. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student Sophomore or junior status Major in Industrial Safety or Occupational Safety Taking at least (6) credit hours Minimum 3.0 GPA Active participation in campus activities/organizations or volunteer in the community Demonstrate financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
